WorkItem.Description:
I didn't see anything in the documentation or interface, but I'm guessing that my Talisman of Sinister Order is not showing in the exported "Available" list because its ilvl (325) is too low.
 
For my poor resto set, I still rank that above Blood of Isiset (which is what RawrTree wants me to use as my second Trinket).
 
Is there something I can do to get the addon to export that trinket?

Comments.Message: Please attach your addon export text in a file so we can take a look.

My bad.  It was in the Addon export.  It (65804) just wasn't in my item list. Rawr WPF 4.1.05.1.  Once I manually add it to items, and then "Update from Addon", it shows up as available.

Perhaps Rawr should warn about items that it doesn't recognize (or just attempt an to auto-add them)?
